desc: Highfield Homeware is a small Family run business. It started after selling products for many companies and having a dream of setting up something myself. I have finally managed to make a dream a reality and will be adding plenty of homeware and gifts to suit everyone and all at an affordable price too.

layout.text: EXPLORE OUR GARDEN COLLECTION FROM PLANT POTS TO FIRE PITS AND A LOVELY RANGE OF GARDEN GIFTS TOO!
